text: Henry Chapier (14 November 1933 – 27 January 2019) was a French journalist, movie critic, television presenter and movie director. He was born in Bucharest, Romania. He later became a stringer at L'Express. He worked for France 3 from 1987 to 1994. Chapier died on 27 January 2019 at the age of 85.Henry Chapier, l'animateur du “Divan”, est mort ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website * Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:French journalists Category:French television personalities Category:French movie critics Category:French movie directors Category:People from Bucharest
title: Henry Chapier
